scripts.info: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/sls info -c ./serverless.yml --aws-s3-accelerate --stage dev --region ap-northeast-1 --aws-profile fl-infrastructure
scripts.deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/sls deploy -c ./serverless.yml --aws-s3-accelerate -v --stage dev --region ap-northeast-1 --aws-profile fl-infrastructure
scripts.remove: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/sls remove -c ./serverless.yml -v --stage dev --region ap-northeast-1 --aws-profile fl-infrastructure
scripts.deploy:debug: cross-env "SLS_DEBUG=*" NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/sls deploy  -c ./serverless.yml --aws-s3-accelerate -v --stage dev --region ap-northeast-1 --aws-profile fl-infrastructure
